extendedInfo.description: This is the #1 Harley-Davidson ringtone app on the android market, and is an absolute MUST HAVE for all Harley motorcycle fans! This compilation soundboard contains 24 of the best tones available and will soon be a full blown Harley motorcycle experience for your mobile device. This app will be updated regularly, so buy with confidence and don't forget to check out my Harley-Davidson Battery Widget apps! My other app "Ultimate Digital Clock Widget" can be easily customized with more than 100 fonts and any color to match your Harley-Davidson theme or live wallpaper.Features:Hi-res graphics and rich user experience.Lots of Harley motorcycle sounds, of course!Tap to toggle sound on and off.Press and hold button to save as a ringtone, notification, or alarm tone.Assign tones to contacts.***************IMPORTANT!!!!This app is ad supported to enable me to continue development and provide full featured apps for free. If you want the ad-free version, you can find it here on the market with my other apps. Please don't leave reviews saying that there is a virus in the app because another app claims advertising to be a "virus". This is unfair to legitimate app developers who are simply trying to monetize their free apps. If you agree to the very clearly presented EULA, you will receive a few ads and you can still save the ringtones by holding the button of the sound you like.We love creating apps, and want to keep them free forever. In order to keep our development running we are using a search service to generate some revenue from this free app. This app will add a couple search links on your device in the form of an icon, bookmark link and browser homepage. You may delete them easily (drag to the trash or delete the link for the browser), if you choose to use them, thanks!TO SAVE A RINGTONE, PRESS AND HOLD THE BUTTON OF THE SOUND THAT YOU WANT TO SAVE AND IT WILL INSTALL TO YOUR SYSTEM RINGTONES. (Settings->Sound->Phone Ringtone)(Settings->Sound->Notification Ringtone)***************

reviews.title: Adware Galore
reviews.comment: It would\'ve been a great app except that it\'s loaded with adware and alerted my virus protection. I suggest saving all the ringtones you like THEN UNINSTALL IT
reviews.author: Denise Stokes

reviews.comment: Pop ups suck
reviews.author: Rich Fisher

reviews.title: Bad
reviews.comment: Sucks
reviews.author: Elijah Dillon

reviews.comment: This app is loaded with adware
reviews.author: Justin Matkins

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: This app looks cool sitting on my home screen however I can\'t make any of the sounds work as my ring tone. It doesn\'t allow me to download the tones.
reviews.author: Larry Earl

reviews.title: Wouldn\'t recommend
reviews.comment: Great sounds, fairly ok to use once you have your head around it, but far too many pushy ads, uninstalled quickly
reviews.author: Andy Spiers

reviews.title: Cool ring tones
reviews.comment: Nice collection of ringtones and #2 is my fav. But on the downside, little difficult to use.   P.s. - please read the app description for instructions before use. It adds the ringtone directly to your stock ringtones and you can select the ringtone from there.
reviews.author: Piyush Yadav

reviews.title: To many ads
reviews.comment: Just way to much in ads! Ridiculous!!!  Un-installing!!!

reviews.title: Really?
reviews.comment: I went to download this then saw all permissions it needs. Why does a ring tone app need to know what accounts are on your phone? It wants full access to everything on your phone. Go to hell!
